power.title: Arcane Bolt
power.fluff: An arrow of force appears next to you, waiting for your gesture that will send it on an unerring path toward an enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes force damage equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. If the target is within 10 squares, the damage increases by +3. If the target is within 5 squares, the damage increases by an additional +3.
